zone.line: error is already expiated; & you remember my ill
words no more. I live a solitary life, and it
is rare that I encounter any stranger with
whom it is pleasant to talk, besides; thier
meditations, even though they be learned, do
not agree with mine, & though I can pardon
this difference, they cannot. Nor have I ever
explained the cause of the dress I wear &
the diversity of th difference which I percieve
in my language and manners and those
which with whom I have in intercourse.
Not but that it is painful to me to live
